characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings, Words of Radiance, Oathbringer, Rhythm of War

characterDescription:
Eshonai is the Parshendi Shardbearer that Dalinar and Kaladin fought at the Tower. She was left alive after being defeated when the Alethi retreated. In The Way of Kings, she was introduced as a " ... seven-foot-tall giant of a Parshendi in gleaming silver Shardplate." Her Shardblade is described as "wicked and barbed, like flames frozen into metal."
She has a sister, Venli, who is a scholar, and a mother, who appears to suffer from some kind of dementia.
